name: Shifter (GGJ 2022)
description:
A 3D FPS Puzzle Platformer where the player must send objects between the Positive and Negative worlds to solve puzzles.

This project was created for the Global Game Jam 2022 where the theme was Duality, and was created with Unreal Engine 4.

My Role

For this project, I was responsible for the VFX, UI, and some gameplay elements.

I created the post-processing effect which applied an outline to objects in the world and implemented the "shifting" functionality which dynamically changed the post-process effect and materials of the objects in the world.

I designed and Implemented all of the UI in the game including the main menu and pause menu.

I also created and implemented an interaction system for buttons and switches to trigger events like opening doors and such.

Controls:
  • WASD - Movement
  • SPACE - Jump
  • LMB - Fire
  • ESC/P - Pause

Developed in January 2022.
